articles.title: Maze Hacker Group Claims Infecting Insurance Giant Chubb with Ransomware

articles.author: John Biggs
articles.title: Luxury Watchmaker Breitling Adds Its First Timepieces to a Blockchain
articles.description: In a rare example of real-world business deployment, Breitling is registering watches on a blockchain to track their provenance from owner to owner.
articles.content:
The Breitling Top Time, pictured above, was a hand-wound chronograph from the 1960s popular with the Jet Set of the era. James Bond wore it in Thunderball, although his featured a miniature Geiger counter.
